item.description:
10:00 a.m. - 4:45 p.m. in the Boston Public Library Rabb Lecture Hall
OPEN MIKE: 1:30 p.m. - 4:00 p.m.

Co-sponsored by Tapestry of Voices and Jaji Aso Studio, in partnership with the Boston Public Library.

56 major and emerging poets will each do a ten minute reading; also featuring Sam Cornish, Boston's first and current Poet Laureate, six extraordinarily talented high school students; two from Boston Latin High School, three from Boston Arts Academy, and one from the Walnut Hill School for the Arts.

Free admission. For information: Tapestry of Voices: (617) 723-3716; Library: (617) 536-5400
item.name: Boston National Poetry Month Festival
